ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: The 'leaflet' JavaScript library provides many plugins some of which are available in the core 'leaflet' package, but there are many more. It is not possible to support them all in the core 'leaflet' package. This package serves as an add-on to the 'leaflet' package by providing extra functionality via 'leaflet' plugins.

The 'leaflet' JavaScript library provides many plugins some of which are available in the core 'leaflet' package, but there are many more. It is not possible to support them all in the core 'leaflet' package. This package serves as an add-on to the 'leaflet' package by providing extra functionality via 'leaflet' plugins.

name: r-leaflet.extras
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "2.0.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-leaflet.extras
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/leaflet.extras_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/leaflet.extras/leaflet.extras_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: deca5ceee3d1b0dbc40195c82d6e4ff2ff48ac5e180244d4f401f3317e43167a

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 1
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-htmltools
    - r-htmlwidgets
    - r-leaflet >=2.0.0
    - r-magrittr
    - r-stringr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-htmltools
    - r-htmlwidgets
    - r-leaflet >=2.0.0
    - r-magrittr
    - r-stringr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('leaflet.extras')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('leaflet.extras')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/bhaskarvk/leaflet.extras, https://bhaskarvk.github.io/leaflet.extras/
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: The 'leaflet' JavaScript library provides many plugins some of which are available in the core 'leaflet' package, but there are many more. It is not possible to support them all in the core 'leaflet' package. This package serves as an add-on to the 'leaflet' package by providing extra functionality via 'leaflet'
    plugins.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - ocefpaf
